attributes.action: Award lottery funding for medals of bravery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to launch a petition to stop the selling of bravery medals by living holders.My proposal is lottery funding should be available to pay the persons selling them these will then be returned to the recipient's.Upon the death of the seller they should revert to government ownership they will then be re-auctioned any money repaid to the lottery fund then if they resell at a higher price any profit will go to surviving relatives.
